text: Martin J. Jackley (born October 13, 1970) is an American attorney and politician. He is the Attorney General of South Dakota since 2023. He held this office before from 2009 to 2019. He ran unsuccessfully for governor in 2018, losing to Republican primary to Kristi Noem. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from South Dakota Category:Politicians from South Dakota Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Marty Jackley
